content.1: And God spake all these words, saying,
content.3: Thou shalt have no other gods before me.
content.4: Thou shalt not make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness
content.5: Thou shalt not bow down thyself to them, nor serve them: for I the
content.6: And shewing mercy unto thousands of them that love me, and keep my commandments.
content.7: Thou shalt not take the name of the
content.8: Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.
content.9: Six days shalt thou labour, and do all thy work:
content.12: Honour thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which the
content.16: Thou shalt not bear false witness against thy neighbour.
content.17: Thou shalt not covet thy neighbour’s house, thou shalt not covet thy neighbour’s wife, nor his manservant, nor his maidservant, nor his ox, nor his ass, nor any thing that
content.18: And all the people saw the thunderings, and the lightnings, and the noise of the trumpet, and the mountain smoking: and when the people saw
content.19: And they said unto Moses, Speak thou with us, and we will hear: but let not God speak with us, lest we die.
content.20: And Moses said unto the people, Fear not: for God is come to prove you, and that his fear may be before your faces, that ye sin not.
content.21: And the people stood afar off, and Moses drew near unto the thick darkness where God
content.23: Ye shall not make with me gods of silver, neither shall ye make unto you gods of gold.
content.24: An altar of earth thou shalt make unto me, and shalt sacrifice thereon thy burnt offerings, and thy peace offerings, thy sheep, and thine oxen: in all places where I record my name I will come unto thee, and I will bless thee.
content.25: And if thou wilt make me an altar of stone, thou shalt not build it of hewn stone: for if thou lift up thy tool upon it, thou hast polluted it.
content.26: Neither shalt thou go up by steps unto mine altar, that thy nakedness be not discovered thereon.
